attributes.action: Create a reciprical agreement with the Spanish government to allow British expatriots to vote in Spanish general elections.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently British citizens who reside in Spain are able to vote in local and European elections. However this right is not extended to general elections. The Spanish government is prepared to allow this providing that the British government agree to a reciprical agreement allowing Spanish citizens residing in Britain to vote in UK elections. Therefore we petition the PM to take action to pursue this right for Britons living in Spain on our behalf.
